__e: I hope someday to be invited to join the barrister's club, Which denotes a certain standing in my profession.
Face it. I'm a little girl playing in an old boys' club.
I'd be the first one in the club to hang one on the wall.
How would you like to be in the Big Girls Club?
And then this one night this guy who owned a white club came in.
Are we still in the Big Girls Club?
He came to the club and asked me to go away with him.
And one night-- it was a night a lot like tonight-- this gorgeous woman comes into the club, asks him if he wants to go out to the jungle.
You have a club to run and a husband who can't stand to live without you.
